page.description: A description of the Namespace used in Local Storage for the component.

discussion.p: The *[ui:Namespace description]* is a description of the Namespace. For example, "An application to capture expenses." The description is stored in the *[js:ALPHA_<Namespace>._INFO]* key in Local Storage for the UX Component. The description is useful to help identify the set of data in Local Storage. *[js:<Namespace>]* is the value defined in the [Namespace property].
